thread.title: S Dhillon

author: S Dhillon
title: S Dhillon
text:
had my tyres changed/fitted by Sanam from tyresonthedrive.com
i shopped around and they were the most cost effective option and included free fitting. a no brainer! saved going out to get them done somewhere else.
really pleasant guy, great communication and interpersonal skills. he called before hand and arrived promptly when expected.
it was raining but he underwent the task without any fuss. did a change to 4 tyres.
highly recommend tyresonthedrive.com and i would definitely be using them again when changing tyres on any of my other vehicles
